name: Cool firetruck game for kid & boy: sound & puzzle
name_original: Cool firetruck game for kid & boy: sound & puzzle
description:
Fireman & Firetruck Games - Is your little one a big lover of firefighters? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the Firefighter Games For Kids App. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging Firetruck Sounds your little fireman can explore...but the Firetruck Game For Kids doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with a Fun Firefighter Match Game, a Throwing Game, and a Beautiful, Real Firefighter Puzzle Game.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a siren is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture of a correct truck.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of fire trucks, siren and firework
- 4 Cool Memory games of cool firefighter pictures
- 4 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level
- 1 Throwing game
- WITHOUT disturbing Ads. This is a paid app, support development of future updates and new games for kids.
